resources.string: Welcome to the Official Unloved Device Manager.
App Developed by: PressY4Pie \n CWM Developed by: koush \n CWM Ported by: to many to count
Here you can change, install and restore recovery images.
Here you can get dumps of images to send to devs.
Here you can Get our contact info and join irc.
Here you can do various other stuff.
Here you can see the credits of this wonderful app.
Your device is not currently supported. You will have access to some options. Join #oudhitsquad on freenode to request support for a device.
These are your Recovery options. Be very careful. We\'ve tried to keep things as safe as possible but there is always room for something to go very wrong.
Here you can download and install the latest uploaded image.
Here you can download and restore a stock image. (Not supported on all devices yet).
Here you can browse for a custom .IMG or .LOK file to install. (Be very careful!)
Here you can add a thing here so it doesn\'t look so dumb.
This is needed for some devices that can\'t use hardware keys.
Could not write log to SD card:
SD card not found or not writable
Log file is larger than %1$,d kB, skipped first %2$,d kB
Here you can make images of some of the important partitions on your device and send them to developers to help get support for your device.
Here you can get a backup of your current recovery image.
Here you can get a backup of your current boot image.
Here you can view some of the important info that a developer may need
Here you can type a custom location to image.
